page.title: 02RECREATION
page.content: There are some very large areas of public open space,notably Hough End, which includes several pitches for team ball games.There are also small areas of football pitches tucked into odd corners,with unrestricted access to the public.There are many private sports clubs which include : MOSS SIDE TENNIS CLUB WHALLEY RANGE AFC BROUGHTON PARK RU WHALLEY RANGE CRICKET/TENNIS CLUB OLD HULMEIANS LACROSSE CLUB In Chorlton Park there are tennis courts,two bowling greens,a children's play area and a small collection of animals for children to see.Most of this park is public open space with some football pitches as well.
